q: business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership'', according to the official Google blog spot. Mr Eric Schmidt would continue to act as an advisor to Mr Larry Page and co-founder Mr Sergey Brin . Larry Page will take charge of Google's day-to-day operations as Chief Executive Officer starting April 4. Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects, in particular working on new products, Mr Eric Schmidt said in the blog spot. The management reshuffle has been brought about to`` streamline decision making and create clearer lines of responsibility and accountability'' at the top of the company, he added
